page.title: 18INDUSTRY-KEARSLEY
page.content: FLETCHERS PAPER MILLS(1823) 270 EMPLOYEES PRODUCING 17,500 TONS MOSTLY PRINTING PAPER FOR DIARIES,BIBLES AND PERIODICALS(25% EXPORTS)USING MOSTLY CHILEAN WOOD PULP. EUROPA TRADING ESTATE MODERN SMALL UNITS-HEALTH,FOODS,VENDING MACHINES,WOOD CRAFT,FORK LIFT TRAINING AND LEASING COMPANY,ELECTRICAL DITRIBUTION DEPOT,CUSTOM COACHWORK,HOLEMASTERS,CWS BANK STATIONERY STORE. KEARSLEY MILL(DISUSED)ADAPTED FOR USE OF SMALL BUSINESSES MAINLY TEXTILES WITH SOME PRINTED CIRCUITS. FISHBROOK IND. ESTATE MISC. UNITS-METAL WORK,WELDING,COACH PAINTING,TEXTILES,PLANT HIRE.
